Replace.Text: Battle for holy domination in this religion-focused scenario set in the Medieval Era. Lasts until the Industrial Era.[NEWLINE]Victory Conditions[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Holy Victory - Have the most religious followers at the dawn of the Industrial Era (first Industrial technology or civic)[NEWLINE]Gameplay Changes[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]First Holy Site grants a free Great Prophet.
Have the most religious followers at the dawn of the Industrial Era (first Industrial technology or civic)
Battle for holy domination in this religion-focused scenario set in the Medieval Era. Lasts until the Industrial Era.
Segervillkor[NEWLINE]Helig seger – Ha flest religiösa följare vid starten av Industriåldern (första industriella vetenskapen eller inriktningen)
